comment.author: 38635198@N04
comment._content: That plane was sponsored by Frank Phillips, founder of Phillips 66,  and is currently on display at Woolaroc near Bartlesville, OK.  It has been restored and 'OKLAHOMA' has been replaced with 'WOOLAROC'.  Woolaroc was Phillips' ranch.   Lots to see there-- western art, exotic animals, firearms collection and Phillips' lodge which was modeled after the Grand Canyon Lodge.
